catalog_info.title: Field Experiences in Earth and Planetary Sciences
catalog_info.notes: Field programs are selected individually by students with the advice and approval of the instructor. Students must notify the instructor and Academic Administrator of intention to enroll by Study Card Day of the preceding term.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: EPS 21 or permission of instructor.
catalog_info.description: Attend a domestic or overseas geological field program of 3-6 weeks duration to learn methods of obtaining, synthesizing, and interpreting field observations.
